en.hero_title:
Build a Lean Business
x10 Performance
en.hero_desc: Ksmart provides solutions, software, and mindset to help SMEs & Business Owners operate optimally and achieve outstanding results with a lean team.
en.val_1_desc: Powerful Automation & AI tools to automate processes and save 80% of operational time.
en.val_2_desc: Sharing Business From Home (BFH) mindset, mastering technology, and building a lifestyle of freedom.
en.val_3_desc: Accompanying businesses in building digital transformation roadmaps and optimizing business models.
en.footer_rights: ¬© 2025 Ksmart Ecosystem. Built to x10 your performance.
en.bento_auto_desc: Closed-loop multi-channel automation system. Free up 90% of manual operational resources with the power of n8n and AI Agents.
en.bento_identity_desc: Unique Digital Twin. Build a sustainable personal brand on an artificial intelligence platform.
en.bento_community_desc: Elite community gathering. Connecting knowledge resources and practical business opportunities for SMEs.
en.bento_academy_desc: Journey of mind liberation. Finding prosperity and peace from the roots through modern education.
en.eco_desc: Components interacting and creating value within the ecosystem.
en.welcome_desc: Start your journey to x10 performance today.
en.welcome_app_ai_desc: Unlimited content creation with AI power.
en.welcome_app_x10_desc: Ready-to-use AI templates and marketing kits.
en.welcome_app_research_desc: Explore latest AI research and business insights.
en.story_p1: There were days I looked in the mirror and asked myself: 'Do I own the business, or does the business own me?'.
en.story_p2: I used to think busyness was the measure of success. But then I realized, true freedom is when we have the right to say no to nameless tasks to focus on the core values.
en.story_p3: Ksmart was born from those sleepless nights. It's not magic. It is digitized discipline. So that we can fight in the market while finding peace in our souls.
en.quote_founder: "Technology exists to liberate humans, helping them do extraordinary things."
en.quote_philosophy: "More than a technology platform. We provide solutions for you to create freedom for yourself."
en.cta_desc: Access free resources to experience it today.
en.footer_desc: Technology ecosystem helping SME and Solopreneurs x10 operational performance.
en.app_fb_desc: Automate customer care and lead generation on Facebook.
en.app_me_desc: Personal AI Assistant for DNA and brand strategy.
en.app_ai_desc: High-end AI image and video creation system for advertising.
en.app_yt_desc: Automate management and optimize performance for global YouTube channels.
